verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker char siu pork] the asian influence here in the hawaiian islands inspired my char siu recipe it tasty as is in a bun or over rice we make it often so we have leftovers to add to fried rice ramen and salads —karen naihe kamuela hawaii char siu char siu pork
